FAQ Speakers Agenda

September 26 & 27

Toronto, Canada

FAQ Speakers Agenda

Shaping the future of Ruby on Rails

Rails World was a two-day, two track community conference where more than 1,000 Rails developers from 57 countries gathered to hear technical talks, demos, networking, and keynotes about the latest features and best practices in Rails development.

Big thank you to our speakers

The following speakers shared valuable insights at Rails World on the future state of Rails and where Rails is headed tomorrow and beyond.

Aaron Patterson

Rails Core & Senior Staff Engineer, Shopify

Rails Core, CTO, 37signals

Thank you, Toronto!

We gathered for two days in one of the coolest venues in Toronto - Evergreen Brick Works - located on the historic site of the former brick works and quarry and surrounded by a beautiful nature park.

Thank you, sponsors!

The following sponsors helped us make Rails World an unforgettable experience, and we are truly grateful for their support.
